definition: a concern with or responsiveness to outward things (especially material objects as opposed to ideal concepts)
details:
noun
- a concern with or responsiveness to outward things (especially material objects as opposed to ideal concepts)
= example: a concern with or responsiveness to outward things (especially material objects as opposed to ideal concepts)
- the quality or state of being outside or directed toward or relating to the outside or exterior
= example: the quality or state of being outside or directed toward or relating to the outside or exterior
= synonyms: externality
- concern with outward things or material objects as opposed to the mind and spirit
= example: concern with outward things or material objects as opposed to the mind and spirit
